story: You live in a busy city on the second floor of an apartment with no elevator. Every day, you navigate crowded streets to get to work, and on the weekends, you run errands like grocery shopping. Still, you crave moments to escape the daily grind and explore quieter roads and open spaces beyond the city. You're searching for a bike that fits this dynamic lifestyle.

You’ve been thinking about switching up your routine—something that can handle weekday rides through city traffic but also feels right when you want to spend a Saturday exploring trails outside town. You live on the second floor of an apartment with no elevator, so carrying things up and down is part of daily life. You’re hoping to find a bike that can handle both sides of your routine without making you feel like you’ve compromised too much on either.
